title: Strawberry custard tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '300g plain flour', '80g caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '125g butter', '1 egg yolk', '150 to 200ml cold water', 'For the filling', '1/2 litre milk', '1/2 vanilla pod, halved lengthways', '130g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '1 punnet strawberries, hulled and halved']
